channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A damaged repair, 13th December
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 6207512 addressed failed repairs in Cold Pool Lane in July 2024. These repairs lasted a couple of months before the repair sank into ground and the road surface reverted back to pre July 2024. The houses either side of Cold Pool Lane/Symphony Road continue to suffer the shockwaves caused by vehicles travelling over the failed repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 13th December
item.description:
A tree has broken/fallen on the left side as you drive up Birdlip Hill. A branch is poking out into the road. When cars are coming the other way, a large vehicle cannot avoid hitting the branch. Please can it be removed/cut back
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain by construction traffic, 13th December
item.description:
///argued.weekend.hiring The drain has been completely blocked by the grass verge that was crushed on top of it by the tarmac repair traffic that has just been in the village. The drain was cleaned out about two weeks ago, but is now completely obscured.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Main Street, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 13th December
item.description:
